item.title: Terror's Comeback
item.description: You thought ISIS was history? Guess again.

item.title: America’s Best Chance to Transform Iran
item.description: The right way to deploy military threats, pressure, and support for the opposition.

item.title: 'Forgotten' Terrorist Groups Are on the Move
item.description: A new U.N. report describes how the resilient Islamic State’s Afghan branch is escalating attacks—powered by AI—beyond its home base.

item.title: Checks and Balance newsletter: What American democracy looks like up close
item.description: John Prideaux, our US editor, reports from the road on why local politics still works
